b:if.b:template-skin: body#layout{height:auto;background-color:#ffffff!important;border:1px solid #ffffff!important;font-size:small;margin:0;min-height:0;padding:87px 0 0;text-align:center;}body#layout,body#layout div.section{font-family:Arial,sans-serif;}body#layout{max-width:1040px;padding:50px 20px;}body#layout:before{content:"Mini Nubie ";position:relative;font-family:-apple-system,BlinkMacSystemFont,'Segoe UI',Roboto,Oxygen,Ubuntu,Cantarell,'Open Sans','Helvetica Neue',sans-serif;font-size:23px;color:#1f2024;text-align:center;}body#layout .widget-content{box-shadow:none!important;}body#layout #theme-info{display:block!important;}body#layout #header{border-radius:8px;}body#layout div.section{display:block;background-color:transparent!important;margin:0 5px 10px!important;padding:16px 16px 18px!important;border-color:#e5e5e5;border-radius:8px;}body#layout .theme-panels .widget{float:left;width:49%;margin-right:1%;}body#layout #theme-info:before{content:'You are Using the Free version of Mini Nubie, do not remove the author credit link';height:48px;font-family:Roboto,sans-serif;font-size:13px;color:#f03a17;line-height:50px;text-align:center;}body#layout #theme-panels{background-color:#edf4ff!important;overflow:hidden!important;border-color:#cdd4ef;border-radius:8px;}body#layout .section h4{font-size:14px!important;line-height:24px;margin:0!important;text-align:left;text-transform:uppercase;}body#layout .section h4:after{font-size:12px;font-weight:400;text-transform:initial;}body#layout #theme-panels h4:after{content:' - by Riyan Firmansyah';}body#layout .theme-panels .widget{float:left;width:49%;margin-right:1%;}body#layout .theme-panels div.layout-widget-description{display:none;}body#layout div.layout-widget-description{font-size:11px!important;line-height:1.2em;}body#layout .theme-panels .widget-content{border-color:#cdd4ef!important;border-radius:8px;}body#layout .locked-widget .widget-content{border-left:10px solid #1a73e8;border-radius:8px;}body#layout .locked-widget .widget-content{background-color:#fff;}body#layout .widget-content{width:auto;max-width:none;max-height:none;margin:0;border:1px solid #e5e5e5;border-left:0;}body#layout .widget-wrap3{border-radius:0 8px 8px 0;overflow:hidden;}body#layout #header h4:after{content:' - Recommended Height (34px)';}body#layout #main-wrapper h4:after{content:' - Default Blog Posts';}body#layout #sidebar-wrapper h4:after{content:' - on All Pages';}body#layout #iklan-atas h4:after{content:' - Adsense Top';}body#layout #iklan-tengah1 h4:after{content:' - Adsense Center 1';}body#layout #iklan-tengah2 h4:after{content:' - Adsense Center 2';}body#layout #iklan-teengah2 h4:after{content:' - Adsense Center 2';}body#layout #iklan-bawah h4:after{content:' - Adsense Bottom';}body#layout .visibility .editlink{background:#1a73e8 url(https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-iQoCOwqjB-w/Wy1bDznOM4I/AAAAAAAACGA/8BUOPStr0sk5oud9hWpHBQTrmkeJDoAvACK4BGAYYCw/s18-c/mode_edit_w600_24dp.png) no-repeat center!important;}body#layout .visibility .layout-widget-state.visible{background-image:url(https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-qicweZaCb7I/XR_IGBqqGfI/AAAAAAAABS0/MIpI_COKj6MBkeN9FEJhqL96WYnYfGjngCK4BGAYYCw/s1600/visibility_c3_600_24dp.png)!important;}body#layout .visibility .layout-widget-state.not-visible{background-image:url(https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-tqL3-mrEM7A/XR_H_P3mFZI/AAAAAAAABSs/4PO1g3CDQbse_mJYzwn-60OQoYMFcq1FQCK4BGAYYCw/s1600/visibility_off_c3_600_24dp.png)!important;opacity:1;}body#layout .draggable-widget .widget-wrap2{border-radius:8px;background:#1a73e8 url(https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-yTAuT5aZ1EY/Wy1eEeo4SbI/AAAAAAAACGM/FxOTPwL-Ch0_lyZxLRzhv2EWHINOmCjWACK4BGAYYCw/s22/draggable.png) no-repeat 4px 50%!important;}body#layout .add_widget{border-radius:8px;}body#layout .widget .widget-content a.editlink{border-radius:100%;}
